Description: Greenish colourless cast glass dish with concave sides, a sharp basal angle and a slightly concave base. There are faint traces of a gilded leaf pattern and border; two wheel cuts on top of the rim; ground inside and out. Some fragments are missing.
Bibliographic references: Glass 2 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass, Volume 2 (535)
Harden et al 1968 / Masterpieces of Glass (35)
